1.00.name: wordpress/panels
1.00.description: Panels is a free WordPress theme with custom header, custom background, custom menus and widgets features - clean, fast loading and displays a featured image for each post (200px by 200px) to give a beautifully simple and consistent feel to your website. Highly customisable, supports widgets and three custom menus, backgrounds and header images - so your website's content stands out.
